title: Email specialist
job_overview:
Hey hey,


I'm looking for someone WITH EXPERIENCE who could help managing emails.

Just because you have written "20" emails and cleaned email list and made 3 email automation - that NOT experience, sorry.

Writing/rewriting, going through stats and making changes based on that, list cleaning, tracking, segmenting, automation, warming up domains (don't worry, will teach this), talk with others freelancers when needed about email related things or other work related things, etc..

Ideally if you have EXPERIENCE understanding API and funnels and maybe coding related things in GENERAL, but that just me dreaming, NOT something you need :) When you message to me please mention also your experience with this even if you don't have any experience.

I do this since 2012 so I do it for a long term and looking to do it few more years, so good opportunity for someone who is serious about the job and not looking for a quick bucks ( This will not work, sorry).

Again, do NOT apply of you do NOT have real experience for atleast 1-2 years and you are able to solve problems on your own (On Your Own not someone telling you what to do... ) when getting back to me, write some examples how you solve problems on your own.


Thanks for understanding.

Thomas
